A long time ago people worshipped a god known as "The Eye". She was the only god they had.
She promised to protect her people with one condition: the surface and the sea belonged to the man, but not the sky.
Centuries passed and people stopped to believe in their god. They wanted to prove that their god does not exist, so they built a huge flying palace.
It was a mistake.
